author: Fiona Blackwood
title: Tasmanian hospital where staff infected with coronavirus to stay open
description: The Tasmanian hospital where two staff members have tested positive to coronavirus and a woman became the state's first COVID-19 fatality will remain open, authorities say, assuring the public they can be "confident about the care they receive".
content:
Updated 
April 04, 2020 13:58:41
Authorities are urgently working to trace people who had contact with two hospital staff members from the medical ward of the North West Regional Hospital who tested positive to coronavirus on Friday.
